body_html:
@meteorcloudy to comment.
I think right now, on windows building tensorflow with bazel works great when you only would like to have CPU support.
For GPU support, we are working on a few issues, but the switch will be immediately after.
We will need to prepare a separate page because there are many details to building on windows, but I am happy to say we are very close to the switch.

body:
@meteorcloudy to comment.
I think right now, on windows building tensorflow with bazel works great when you only would like to have CPU support.
For GPU support, we are working on a few issues, but the switch will be immediately after.
We will need to prepare a separate page because there are many details to building on windows, but I am happy to say we are very close to the switch.
